channel.title: [508] Berky-Scape Source Char help [508] NEED HELPPP NOWWW!
channel.description: hey everybody, im new to coding 508 servers, recently i've been using Berky-Scape Source, for my 508 server and there is no command to change from male to female, is there anyway that i can add it? :D

item.title: [508] Berky-Scape Source Char help [508] NEED HELPPP NOWWW!
item.dc:creator: @TimeToCode TimeToCode
item.description:
@TimeToCode wrote:

mmh yes sec
hope this works

[code]} else if(cmd[0].equals(“female”)) {
p.look[0] = 48; // Hair
p.look[1] = 1000; // Beard
p.look[2] = 57; // Torso
p.look[3] = 64; // Arms
p.look[4] = 68; // Bracelets
p.look[5] = 77; // Legs
p.look[6] = 80; // Shoes
p.gender = 1;
p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
p.updateReq = true;

} else if(cmd[0].equals(“male”)) {
p.look[0] = 5;
p.look[1] = 14;
p.look[2] = 18;
p.look[3] = 27;
p.look[4] = 33;
p.look[5] = 87;
p.look[6] = 42;
p.gender = 0;
p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
p.updateReq = true;[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2010, 12:31:23 pm[/size][hr][quote=“TimeToCode”]mmh yes sec
hope this works

[code]} else if(cmd[0].equals(“female”)) {
p.look[0] = 48; // Hair
p.look[1] = 1000; // Beard
p.look[2] = 57; // Torso
p.look[3] = 64; // Arms
p.look[4] = 68; // Bracelets
p.look[5] = 77; // Legs
p.look[6] = 80; // Shoes
p.gender = 1;
p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
p.updateReq = true;

} else if(cmd[0].equals(“male”)) {
p.look[0] = 5;
p.look[1] = 14;
p.look[2] = 18;
p.look[3] = 27;
p.look[4] = 33;
p.look[5] = 87;
p.look[6] = 42;
p.gender = 0;
p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
p.updateReq = true;[/code][/quote]
add it in commands.java
